items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft
items.body: Great soft material, bought 2 more because I liked it so much. Haven't washed it yet so not sure about durability. Lightweight but also warm because the fabric has a tight weave. Read more
items.author: Real Person real reviews

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute fit and love the colors
items.body: Star down because it came with a strange smell and quite a few loose strings. But after a wash, it is a very soft lightweight sweater. I really like the colors. The buttons are secure well and can be buttoned/unbuttoned securely. The fit is nice! I have shorter arms and I think it still fits well. Read more
items.author: dwzkd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Cute sweater. Fits loose Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Review - Super comfy sweater!
items.body: So cute! Really great quality and perfect for fall and winter outfits. Super warm as well! Read more
items.author: Meghan Smiley-Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderfully Soft Knit
items.body: This cute, and very soft, bright colored sweater has small white buttons down the front for closure, and the neck and sleeve cuffs neatly roll one turn. The stripes are a bright shade of red or white and didn't fade or bleed when washed. The stitching is well done through out. One thing I noticed is the buttonholes are round and outlined with a single thread. Since the yarn is quite stretchy, the buttonholes return to a round shaped hole. I ordered my usual size, Large, but the overall shape is loose-boxy so a size smaller may be better. If you plan on ordering down a size, check the size chart for length of body and sleeves. This sweater hits mid-hip and the sleeve length is perfect. I machine washed and dried it; the length and width measurements each lost about 1/4 inch. The sleeve width remained at 6" across. Read more
items.author: Kim

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is what it is - lightweight and very boxy
items.body: The material of this sweater has an unusual hand-feel; it is thin and smooth - almost to the point of feeling ...slippery. I chose the beige and white and it is exactly as it is pictured on the website - but the way the (very thin) model is wearing it makes it appear more elevated. If it is buttoned like a normal person would wear such a sweater, it is quite boxy [bordering on frumpy] looking. It is not flattering to normal or heavy body types due to this boxy style (e.g. no darts, baggy, drop shoulder sleeves, no seaming) and horizontal stripes. I give it good marks for what it is though at the ~$29 price: it is a light, throw-on sweater in a boxy style Read more
items.author: Midwest Bibliophile

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish striped cardigan
items.body: This sweater is wonderfully soft. The style and fit are classic cardigan. It makes being both cozy and stylish easy. The colors are beautiful. The sweater is well made with sturdy seam stitches. The buttons are securely attached and fit perfectly into the button holes. I highly recommend this for you or to give as a gift. It will not disappoint. Read more
items.author: Meg Darling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfectly Oversized
items.body: This button-down cardigan sweater is so comfortable and effortlessly stylish. It has that slightly relaxed, oversized fit that’s right on trend, loose enough for layering but still tailored enough to look neat and flattering. The length is perfect, hitting right at the hip, and it fits true to size, so there’s no need to size up or down. The blue-and-white stripe pattern gives it a classic, coastal feel that looks great with jeans, leggings, or even layered over a dress. The material blend (polyester, viscose, acrylic, and polyamide) makes it soft, lightweight, and warm without being bulky. It has a nice stretch and holds its shape well. I also appreciate that it’s easy to care for, machine washable and tumble dry low, a big plus for everyday wear. The quality feels solid, with neat stitching, smooth buttons, and a cozy knit texture that looks more expensive than it is. Pros: Soft, breathable knit with a quality feel Slightly oversized but still flattering Great length and fit (true to size) Easy to wash and maintain Versatile style, casual or slightly dressy Cons: None so far, just be mindful of snagging on jewelry due to the knit texture Overall, this cardigan delivers both comfort and timeless style. It’s a piece you’ll reach for again and again, perfect for layering in any season. Read more
items.author: Southern Reviewer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Navy, Wineblue, Beige, Blue, Black, Coffee, Pinkgreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
